scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n FRONTEND,API "npm -w src/frontend run dev" "npm -w src/api run dev"
scripts.build: npm -w src/frontend run build && npm -w src/api run build
scripts.test: npm -w src/api run test && npm -w src/frontend run test
scripts.start: npm -w src/api run test && npm -w src/frontend run test && concurrently -k -n FRONTEND,API "npm -w src/frontend run dev" "npm -w src/api run dev"
